message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider my counteroffer?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While $13,000 is a good starting point, I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my original asking price.  I'm willing to come down to $14,000.  This would be a fair compromise, giving us both a good deal.  Let me know what you think.

I understand your desire to get closer to your original asking price, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $13,500. Can you consider this compromise?
